tools.name: AWS Extender CLI
tools.description: Test S3 buckets as well as Google Storage buckets and Azure Storage containers for common misconfiguration issues

tools.name: aws_pwn
tools.description: Collection of AWS penetration testing scripts

tools.name: AzureADRecon
tools.description: Gathers information about the Azure Active Directory and generates a report which can provide a holistic picture of the current state of the target environment

tools.name: CloudGPT
tools.description: Vulnerability scanner for AWS customer managed policies using ChatGPT

tools.name: CloudMapper
tools.description: Analyze AWS environments auditing for security issues

tools.name: CloudTracker
tools.description: Find over-privileged IAM users and roles by comparing CloudTrail logs with current IAM policies
